# Question 1

```{r error = TRUE}

# x is numeric vector, total is length 1 num
split_bill <- function(x, total)
{
  
  # valid total check
  if(total < sum(x))
  {stop("invalid input")}

  
  # num result
  res <- character(0)
  
  # calc each res entry
  for(i in seq_along(x))
  {
    res[i] <- unlist(strsplit(paste("$",format(((x[i] / sum(x)) * total), digits = 4, nsmall = 2), sep = ""), split = " "))
  }
  
  # change names of result
  names(res) <- names(x)

  # print totals with $ in front of total
  res
  
}

x1 <- c("Person A" = 12.50, "Person B" = 17.50, "Person C" = 20.00)

split_bill(x1, 50)

split_bill(x1, 60)

split_bill(c(x1, "Person D" = 12.50), 70)

split_bill(c(x1, "Person D" = 12.50, "Person E" = 9.99), 100)

split_bill(x1, 5)

```
